body:
Mods > spambots confirmed
This happened around 8PM EST, 1/24/16 on server DMT02. Around a hundred spambots attacked the server, then the mods destroyed them all.
I have also heard that they invaded ocn as well. During normal gameplay I listen to a sick remix of Undertale Spider Dance so that's why there's music in the background.
tfw not youtube

The attacker probably leaked a bunch of accounts, then took control of each to rapidly spam messages. It is ridiculously easy to get leaked accounts (just a quick Google search will do), so it's not that hard. But no leak is strong enough to beat the mighty ban hammer.

I now have more footage uploaded:
https://youtu.be/K6-g7fDaELE (12 minutes)
Link to original video:
https://youtu.be/2GfRvxUPfz4 (3 minutes)

We will all remember this day... AS THE DAY THE SPAMBOTS GOT REKT

I have more videos coming soon, dang it slow upload speed.

replies.body:
You know spammers annoy me as much as the next guy but this is just legend.

I cant help but appreciate these people's devotion to trolling, its beautiful.

Its like legoblokkk and his alt generator, Grape banned him like 47 times before an admin finally showed up and ip banned him....But it was legendary, its a wreck to the server but i must give a hand to the culprit

replies.body:
It's funny, because I banned this one guy off my own server, then he tried to come back with about 20 leaked accounts. Luckily I thought one step ahead and IP-banned him :D

But dang, I agree. I have to give props to the guy, even though he is a troll.
